mapper.insert: insert into warranty_claim (claim_id, order_id, email_address, product_model, defective_product_qty, series_no, order_details, photo_path, receiver_name, phone_number, address_line1, address_line2, country_code, state, city, post_code, claim_time) values (#{claimId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emailAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{defectiveProductQty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{seriesNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderDetails,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{photoPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addressLine1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addressLine2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{countryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{claimTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update warranty_claim set order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email_address = #{emailAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_model = #{productModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, defective_product_qty = #{defectiveProductQty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, series_no = #{seriesNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_details = #{orderDetails,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, photo_path = #{photoPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiver_name = #{receiverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address_line1 = #{addressLine1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address_line2 = #{addressLine2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, country_code = #{countryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, post_code = #{postCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, claim_time = #{claimTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where claim_id = #{claimId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select claim_id, order_id, email_address, product_model, defective_product_qty, series_no, order_details, photo_path, receiver_name, phone_number, address_line1, address_line2, country_code, state, city, post_code, claim_time from warranty_claim where claim_id = #{claimId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select claim_id, order_id, email_address, product_model, defective_product_qty, series_no, order_details, photo_path, receiver_name, phone_number, address_line1, address_line2, country_code, state, city, post_code, claim_time from warranty_claim
